title: Morning Prayer 1
content: Oh Lord, as I start my day, fill me with your light and guide my steps.

title: Morning Prayer 2
content: Thank you for the gift of a new day. Help me to use it wisely.

title: Morning Prayer 3
content: Grant me strength and wisdom for the challenges ahead.

title: Evening Prayer 1
content: As the day ends, I reflect on your blessings and seek your peace.

title: Evening Prayer 2
content: Forgive my shortcomings and renew me for tomorrow.

title: Evening Prayer 3
content: Watch over me through the night and grant me restful sleep.

title: Special Prayer 1
content: For special occasions, may your presence be felt in every moment.

title: Special Prayer 2
content: In times of need, your grace sustains me.

title: Special Prayer 3
content: Bless those around me and guide our paths together.
